short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension connected to the portal for sending boxes not leaving from favourite CRM system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LocalHeroBox Extension is the ultimate solution for anyone looking to streamline their box sending process without ever leaving their favorite CRM system, such as Salesforce. With our extension, you can easily send boxes to customers or your own company employees with just a few clicks.

LocalHeroBox Extension is incredibly easy to use. Simply install the extension, integrate it with your CRM system, and you're ready to start sending boxes. You can easily select the products you want to send, enter the shipping information, and even add a personalized message for the recipient.

But that's not all! LocalHeroBox Extension also includes a variety of features to help you manage your box sending process. From tracking shipments to managing inventory, our extension makes it easy to stay on top of everything. Plus, our extension is completely free to use and available on the Chrome Web Store.

Join the LocalHeroBox community today and start streamlining your box sending process with our extension!
